description.value: Used immediately after Striking a target, they take @Damage[(1d8+4)[electricity]] damage and must make a @Check[fortitude|dc:24] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute. On a critical fail, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} instead.
They can hurl a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} as per the spell cast at level 4. This can only be done twice a day.
The clockwork pony explodes in a fit of electricity. All creatures within 10 feet of the pony take precisely @Damage[9[electricity]|options:area-damage] damage and must save against Shocking Touch.
